TopicTitle: Is it possible to get the periapsis of an asteroid?

Articles.Content: I am a beginning plugin developer with little coding experience, and was wondering if you can get the info of a space object for a plugin? I know its a noob question, but if you can help it would be greatly appreciated.
Yes, you can get those since an asteroid is seen as a Vessel by the game so it have all the orbit info you need.
